definitions.definition: To make more beautiful and attractive by adding ornamentation ; to decorate .
examples: The old book cover was embellished with golden letters

definitions.definition: To enhance by adding something not strictly integral or necessary .
To make something sound or look better or more acceptable than it is in reality; to distort , to embroider .

main_definition: To make more beautiful and attractive by adding ornamentation ; to decorate .
secondary_definitions: ( by extension ) To enhance by adding something not strictly integral or necessary .
To make something sound or look better or more acceptable than it is in reality; to distort , to embroider .
